settings.content: Display real-time inventory counts on product pages. Requires a Storefront API access token.

settings.label: Enable live inventory counter
settings.info: Show inventory count on product pages

settings.label: Storefront API Access Token
settings.info: Required for real-time updates. Create in Shopify Admin → Settings → Apps → Develop apps. This token is safe to use in frontend code (read-only access).

settings.label: Update frequency (seconds)
settings.info: How often to check for inventory changes. Lower values = more real-time, higher API usage.
